Movies.Title: 600 Miles
Movies.Actors: Tim Roth, Kristyan Ferrer, Mónica Del Carmen, Craig Hensley
Movies.Plot: Arnulfo Rubio smuggles weapons for a deadly Mexican cartel. ATF agent Hank Harris attempts to apprehend him, but gets kidnapped by Rubio, instead. Rubio takes him to his bosses, but during the 600-miles-long drive, they slowly befriend.

Movies.Title: Lucha Mexico
Movies.Actors: Perro Aguayo Jr., Jon Anderson, Matt Bloom, Blue Demon Jr.
Movies.Plot: An exciting inside look at the stars of Lucha Libre, Mexico's distinctly colorful brand of professional wrestling, where flesh and blood Superheroes have performed for generations of fans. ...

Movies.Title: Saving Mr. Wu
Movies.Writer: Alex Jia (script advisor), Ding Sheng, Ding Sheng
Movies.Actors: Andy Lau, Ye Liu, Qianyuan Wang, Ruofu Wu
Movies.Plot: Mr. Wu, a Hong Kong movie star, is kidnapped by four unpredictable criminals disguised as police officers. Will he get rescued?
